侢字的基本解释

侢
dài
古同“戴”。

侢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dài］
［《廣韻》都代切，去代，端。］
亦作“侢1”。“載3”的被通假字。
(1)把东西加在头上或用头顶着。
(2)引申指加物于面、手、胸等之上。
(3)捧，举。
(4)竖立。
(5)尊奉，拥戴。
(6)引申指感恩。
(7)值，当。
(8)棺束。古时棺饰的一种，以其颜色、数目标示丧者的地位。
(9)通“載”。行，遵从。
(10)通“載”。侧。参见“戴目”。
(11)通“載”。周代国名。故址在今河南省民权县以东。
(12)姓。

侢字的康熙字典解释
侢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
侢字的起名意思

暂无。

Tong
Basic explanation of words
Tong
dài
Gu Tong "Dai".
Tong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dài］
["Guangyun" is cut on behalf of the generation, the generation, the end. ]
Also known as "侢1". The false character of "carriage 3" was passed.
(1) Put things on the head or put it on the head.
(2) The extension refers to adding things on the face, hands, chest, etc.
(3) Holding, lifting.
(4) Erected.
(5) Respect and support.
(6) The extension refers to gratitude.
(7) Value, when.
(8) Coffin bundle. A type of coffin decoration in ancient times, with its color and number to indicate the status of the bereaved.
(9) Pass "load". OK, follow.
(10) Pass "load". side. See "wearing eyes".
(11) Pass "load". The name of the country in Zhou Dynasty. The former site is to the east of Minquan County, Henan Province.
(12) Last name.
